0100001010110101 0110000011110010 0 -> sum: 1010001110100111, cout: 0
1111101110110111 1110111001100101 0 -> sum: 1110101000011100, cout: 1
1100111010101010 0110111100001101 0 -> sum: 0011110110110111, cout: 1
